event.title: Children's Ministry Conference
event.intro: Mark your calendars for July 24-26, 2003! We will host our 3rd conference this year. Our conference theme is "Shine, Jesus, Shine" taken from Matthew 5:16. We want Jesus to shine through us as we serve Him by ministering to kids.
event.detail: Mark your calendars for July 24-26, 2003! We will host our 3rd conference this year. Our conference theme is "Shine, Jesus, Shine" taken from Matthew 5:16. We want Jesus to shine through us as we serve Him by ministering to kids. Guest speaker Gary Rodriguez from Calvary Chapel Old Bridge joins us this year. There will be an abundance of workshops with leaders sharing from their personal experiences. We desire to equip and encourage all those who work with children. Registration will begin in May. Call Donna Cano at the church for more info

event.title: Christopher Ross
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Eph-pha-tha
event.detail: Eph-pha-tha is a local full piece band with a new CD. Check out their web site. Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Mexico Mission Trip
event.detail: Join the Pan de Vida Ministry on Jul 11-13 as they share the love of Jesus with His children south of the border. Sign up at the Events Ceneter in the lobby.

event.title: 4th of July Festivities
event.detail: Please join us at the Wells Branch Community Center for fun, fellowshp and fireworks. Pick up a flyer at the Information Center in the lobby.

event.title: Calvary Chapel Mid South College and Career Conference and Retreat 2003
event.detail: Early registration is over, but time is still available to sign up! Find out more details and view the retreat video (high res) with some clips from last year!

event.title: Men's Retreat
event.detail: Registration continues for the Sep 25-27 retreat at T-Bar M Ranch in San Marcos. The main speaker will be Ken Graves from Calvary Chapel Bangor Maine. Men mark your calendars and sign up at the Events Center. A 50% deposit is due by July 6.
